body.name: Extra Large Kitchen Utensils Holder with 4 Compartments, Wooden Utensil Organizer for Kitchen Countertop, Farmhouse Kitchen Decor, Rustic Cooking Utensil - Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs
features: UPGRADE DIVIDER DESIGN - Our wooden utensil organizer has 4 compartments. Large, roomy and pretty. Easy to grab utensils. Size:15.74"L x 5.9"W x 7.08"H. You can store all of your cooking tools easily and neatly. The rectangular shape can fit in nicely against the wall. A nice kitchen decoration!

REMOVEABLE COVER - The middle divider can be removed, more convenient to clean the corner. Please wipe it after cleaning. For the first time to use, we recommend you wipe it with a damp cloth. It is not recommend that you wash wooden products in the dishwasher. Please wash the utensil holder by hand.

SPACE SAVING - Let you no longer dig through a cluttered drawer to find your favorite cook tools again. Move around the countertop, kitchen table, dining room, patio, etc, and you don't have to worry about tipping over.

WIDELY USED - It can store not only baking utensils, but also oil bottles, spatula, knives and forks, etc. Image it is a storage for clean and tidy. It looks beautiful when displayed in your home or kitchen counter.

IDEAL GIFT - Aesthetically appealing, unique design. It is a game changer and pretty decoration for the kitchen. You can DIY in the back with white or gold grease pencils, add a decal or paint it as a gift for your families or friends!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tidy Your Kitchen Researchers from Cornell University's Food and Brand Lab found that study participants snacked on double the number of calories when standing in a messy kitchen compared to when they stood in an orderly one. You must like the sight of a clean kitchen.

Previous page Removable Board The detachable board can be used as a 4-compartments, or as 3, 2, or 1. Ideal for diverse utensils. Black Background The back is pure black without any pattern, diy your own name card or draw your favorite pattern. Tidy Your Kitchen You must like the sight of a clean kitchen. How is it packaged? We have upgrade our packing and added many shockproof devices to protect our products from being damaged as much as possible. Product Service? If you have any questions, please feel free to ask and we will provide you with a satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had an older round utensil holder and even though it rotated still had problems finding whatever utensil I needed. This holder takes up less counter space and it's much easier to locate a particular utensil. It's sturdily built and think it will hold up well. Looks great on my counter!

reviews.reviewText: It looks good on the counter top.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as I expected
reviews.reviewText: VERY handy! Very well made. Helps create more space for kitchen tools!

reviews.reviewerName: I have this as a gift when they opened it it was damage it was obvious that it already been used for it didn’t pass inspection. I bought another for my friends companion at PetSmart
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Organization & looks great
reviews.reviewText: Well done looks great on my counter & l love the color

reviews.reviewerName: I received my Starsea rollator walker today.  I did received the walker fully assembled.  It has a very good maneuver around my house. It isnt bulky.  It goes through doorways with very good ease.   I have one concern. It reads this walker holds up to 300 lbs. in weight. I weigh close to 180bls. As I sit on the walker/ pushed through my house. The back wheels crack/ leans sideways. I hope this is just a flaw. I think folks should be aware of this flaw before they purchase this walker. One could receive a bad injury.  The walker may collapse while being pushed sitting on it.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just had my kitchen remodeled. This fits perfect in my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pulled apart in less than 2 weeks - now fixed and looking/working well.
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE BELOW. On the plus side, this utensil holder is very cute. I was excited to use it to organize some of my utensils on my kitchen counter. Unfortunately, it took less than 2 weeks for the back to pull away from the front of the holder. The back of the holder at each corner was attached to the front with only very small brads, which was not strong enough to hold my utensils. I have fixed it with wood glue on the corners and then pressing the brads back into place. I'm crossing my fingers that my repair works.UPDATE: the company contacted me to offer a replacement. As noted above, I was able to fix the organizer myself, so there was no need to replace it, but I appreciate their response. I am happy with how it looks and how it organizes my utensils. I am increasing my rating to 4 stars.

reviews.reviewText: This worked perfect for me. Good quality and looked just like the picture and description that was given. Holds a lot of utensils and it's very farmhouse looking in my kitchen.
